sentences.en: Didier Drogba says Chelsea are paying in Europe for the Frisk affair.
sentences.cn: 德罗巴称切尔西正在欧洲为弗里斯克裁判事件买单.

sentences.en: Frisk was minding his own business and we ended up threatening his family.
sentences.cn: Frisk只是在尽自己的责任,我们却威胁了他的全家.

sentences.en: Lambs frisk and play , the shepherds pipe all day.
sentences.cn: 羊羔追逐嬉闹,牧笛声终日盘桓萦绕.

sentences.en: The lambs were frisking around the pen.
sentences.cn: 小羊在羊圈里蹦来跳去。

sentences.en: Then with a doleful sigh, he gave Michael a thorough frisk for a weapon.
sentences.cn: 然后他悲叹了一声,彻底搜了迈克尔的身, 看他是否带有武器.

sentences.en: They gave him a thorough frisk for drugs.
sentences.cn: 他们对他彻底搜身寻找毒品.

words.tran_cn: 搜身；快乐；蹦跳；快乐的时刻

trans.tran_cn: 快乐, 快乐的时刻, 搜身

trans.tran_en: if a young animal frisks, it runs and jumps playfully
